twist

A bunch of flexible mixins, using Sass/Compass.

ButtonsAlertsFormsTableTypographyGridView the Project on GitHub stevemckinney/twist

Element

Example usage: @include element($main-color: #444, $text-color: #fff, $hover: true);

Button Button Button Button Button Button

Button groups

Usage: .group { @include group(.button-class); }

Here is an alert, hello.

Detailed usage ▾

@include element(
	$main-color: $alt, // any colour
	$text-color: $white, // any colour
	$radius: $radius, // any radius, false for none
	$subtle: false, // fully only styled on hover/active
	$shading: true, // remove gradients/shadows
	$size: $default-size, // adjust the size with a number 1, 2, 3, etc
	$hover: false, // add a hover state
	$font-size: false, // change font-size
	$display: inline-block, // change the display type
	$dry: false // use no repetitive code see alternative usage
);

Alternative usage ▾

// extend this
@include element-base(
	$size: $default-size, // adjust the size with a number 1, 2, 3, etc
	$font-size: false, // any size
	$text-color: $white, // any colour
	$subtle: false, // fully only styled on hover/active
	$radius: $radius, // any radius, false for nothing 
	$display: inline-block // change the display type
);
@include element($alt, $dry: true);

Forms

Usage: @include form($main-color: #444, $type: input);
@include form-label($position: top);

This is help text under the form field.

Table

Usage: @include table($main-color: #444, $striped: true);
